abstract: Technology and financial companies dragged down stock indexes on Wednesday, on a weaker earnings outlook, overshadowing speculation that the Federal Reserve would take steps to bolster the economy, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: Technology and financial companies dragged down stock indexes on Wednesday, on a weaker earnings outlook, overshadowing speculation that the Federal Reserve would take steps to bolster the economy, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: A weaker earnings outlook for technology and financial companies dragged down stock indexes on Wednesday, overshadowing speculation that the Federal Reserve would take steps to bolster the economy, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Investors Unnerved by Slides in Tech and Financials
